text: Ramsa kha akadikmak Pathian chongkachoipa le inruoiya insurra inleiruoi. Akadikmak Pathian chongkachoipa khan ramsa maikuungnga chuon-inlak athoa inpumma ramsa ramil indeeng khat-um ramsa ramil diang chubei katho mi ngaikha maleisei tho-ah aleikeiruoi. Ramsa li Akadikmak Pathian chongkachoipa kha inring pumma sulfur le inruoiya kakaang meikhur khan indeengluut jei. Chonglar 13:1-18
